events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car and a light pole on 2024-04-30 at approximately 8 PM.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing initial incident details and damage description.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to manage this case and contact the customer promptly.
Customer acknowledged receipt of claim confirmation and appreciated the timely response from the insurance company.
Request sent for driverâ€™s license copy, police accident report, and photos of vehicle damage for further processing.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos, speeding ticket report, and repair estimates.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and police reports to clarify fault and claim validity.
Investigation concluded with determination that the customer was not at fault and damage assessment is accurate.
A settlement offer was proposed covering full repair costs and rental car reimbursement while vehicle is serviced.
Customer expressed gratitude for the quick resolution and clear communication throughout the claims process.
Claim formally approved after acceptance of settlement terms by the customer via online portal.
Payment for repairs and additional coverage was issued directly to the authorized repair shop as agreed.
The claim case has been closed successfully with all obligations fulfilled and customer notified.
All claim files and communications were archived for future reference and compliance requirements.
